# sleuth_team (Resource)

Manages a team.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "sleuth_team" "sampleteam" {
   name = "Sample team"
   members = [1] # use user IDs from GraphQL API
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `members` (List of Number) Members
- `name` (String) name of the team

### Read-Only

- `slug` (String) schema
